title: Nishina-Kun No Henshuu Boukenki ~Ranobe Wa Danjon De Tsukurareru~
alternative_title: 仁科くんの編集冒険記 ～ラノベはダンジョンで創られる～ ; Nishina-kun's Editorial Adventures: Light Novels are Made in Dungeons
status: 仁科くんの編集冒険記 ～ラノベはダンジョンで創られる～ ; Nishina-kun's Editorial Adventures: Light Novels are Made in Dungeons
description:
Description :
        A college student, Hiroki Nishina, was introduced by his senpai to a part-time job in the light novel editorial department of a publishing company, but on his first day of work, he was somehow transported to another world(?).

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 3: Is Your Part-Time Job In Another World?
Vol.1 Chapter 2: My Part-Time Job Is In Another World
Vol.1 Chapter 1: Part-Time In Another World?
